content: We are marketing team of @DragonBounty management . We are a Crypto & NFT promoter, giveaway host on twitter with 339K+ Active Crypto and NFT Followers. We can promote your projects to:• Increase your twitter, discord members , and telegram members• Increase the engagement of your posts, and make your hashtag trend • Likes, and positive feedback on your project• Increase the engagement CMC , CGK , DEXTOOLS , GLEAMLINK PROMOTION , etcWe never pay bots for our services & We have also been part of the success of the $LEON projectOur Telegram account: https://t.me/DragonBounty If you are interested, then defiinitely contact us, Thanks.Why Hire us?Develop Bounty Strategy weekly based tasksFast Bounty Campaign LaunchForum thread design & layoutDevelop Gleam mandatory taskTurn-key campaign moderation: stakes count, rewards calculation, etc.Bounty group support 16/7Escrow the Bounty pool and distribute it in a weekly basis or when the campaign ends.We can also provide list of other service providers such as:Friendly Community Manager
